snippet: Apps can make history come alive, through timelines, photographs and video.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column reviews mobile apps that can make the study of history come alive; notes Indiegogo has released mobile app, and that Timeful, created by psychology professor Dan Ariely, help ease time management.
lead_paragraph: Apps can make history come alive, through timelines, photographs and video.

headline.print_headline: A Touch Screen Becomes a Window to the Past
headline.main: A Touch Screen Becomes a Window to the Past
